label: Paragraphs 1
value: Cornerstone is our youth group for secondary school age, meeting every Wednesday at church from 6:00pm-7:00pm.

label: Paragraphs 2
value: We spend time together in Scripture, discussion, prayer, and friendship.

label: Cta html
value: If you are a parent/carer or young person and would like more details, get in touch.
notes: HTML allowed. Keep links as text.

label: Paragraphs 1
value: We also run a youth Bible study during selected Sunday gatherings for Years 7-10.

label: Paragraphs 2
value: Our heart is to help young people know Jesus, grow in faith, and play a full part in church life.
